org.openni.android

Class OpenNIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openni.android.OpenNIHelper

  • public class OpenNIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides facilities needed for using OpenNI in Android applications. This class takes care of:
    • Loading of OpenNI native libraries.
    • Copying OpenNI configuration and data files that are bundled in the APK as assets.
    • Enumerating the connected OpenNI-compliant devices.
    • Obtaining access permissions for OpenNI-compliant devices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenNIHelper

        public OpenNIHelper(Context context)
        Constructs an OpenNIHelper object. The constructor also extracts all files saved in assets/openni, to make them accessible to OpenNI.
        Parameters:
        context - a Context object used to access application assets.

    • Method Detail

      • requestDeviceOpen

        public void requestDeviceOpen(java.lang.String uri,
                              OpenNIHelper.DeviceOpenListener listener)
        Requests opening the specified device. If the device is a USB device, this may result in a system dialog being displayed to the user if permission had not already been granted. Success or failure is notified via a call the OpenNIHelper.DeviceOpenListener interface. If successful, this grants the caller permission to access the device only until the device is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        uri - device to open
        listener - a listener to be notified about the result.

      • getUsbDevice

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Releases the resources used by the helper.
